CellDescriptionGenerator.cc

00001 #include "CellDescriptionGenerator.hh"
00002 
00003 #include "EVENT/LCGenericObject.h"
00004 
00005 #include "ModuleLocation.hh"
00006 #include "ModuleDescription.hh"
00007 #include "ModuleConnection.hh"
00008 
00009 #include "DetectorTransformation.hh"
00010 
00011 #include <iostream>
00012 #include <cmath>
00013 
00014 // to be able to use streamlog_out like in Processors
00015 #include "marlin/Processor.h"
00016 
00017 namespace CALICE {
00018 
00019   void CellDescriptionGenerator::generate(const lcio::LCCollection* modDescriptionCol, const lcio::LCCollection* modConnectionCol, const lcio::LCCollection* modLocationCol, const lcio::LCCollection* detTransformationCol, MappedContainer<CellDescription>* container ) const {
00020 
00021     typedef std::map<int,ModuleLocation*> locationMap_t;
00022     locationMap_t locationMap;
00023     typedef std::map<unsigned char,ModuleDescription*> descriptionMap_t;
00024     descriptionMap_t descriptionMap;
00025 
00026     float angle = 0;
00027     float xDetector = 0;
00028     float yDetector = 0;
00029     float zDetector = 0;
00030 
00031     const float pi = M_PI;
00032 
00033     container->clear();
00034 
00035     if (detTransformationCol->getNumberOfElements() == 1) {
00036       DetectorTransformation* transformation = new DetectorTransformation( dynamic_cast<lcio::LCGenericObject*>(detTransformationCol->getElementAt(0)) );
00037 
00038       angle =  -1*transformation->getDetectorAngleZX(); // wrong notation of rotation angle in the database
00039       xDetector = transformation->getDetectorX0();
00040       yDetector = transformation->getDetectorY0();//wrong meaning of y-detector in the data base
00041       zDetector = transformation->getDetectorZ0();
00042 
00043       std::cout << "detector transformation record angle: " << angle << "deg position: ("
00044                 << xDetector <<"," << yDetector <<"," << zDetector <<")" << std::endl;
00045       delete transformation;
00046     }
00047     else std::cout << "ERROR: not exactly one detector transformation" << std::endl;
00048 
00049     for (int nDesc=0; nDesc < modDescriptionCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++nDesc) {
00050       ModuleDescription* description = new ModuleDescription( dynamic_cast<lcio::LCGenericObject*>(modDescriptionCol->getElementAt(nDesc)) );
00051       descriptionMap[description->getModuleType()] = description;
00052       std::cout << "module description record " << nDesc << " type: " << (int)(description->getModuleType()) << std::endl;
00053     }
00054     for (int nLoc=0; nLoc < modLocationCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++nLoc) {
00055       ModuleLocation* location = new ModuleLocation( dynamic_cast<lcio::LCGenericObject*>(modLocationCol->getElementAt(nLoc)) );
00056       locationMap[location->getCellIndexOffset()] = location;
00057       std::cout << "module location " << nLoc << std::hex <<" index: " << location->getCellIndexOffset() << std::dec << " type " << (int)location->getModuleType()  << std::endl;
00058       std::cout << "                position: (x,y,z) (" << location->getX() << "," <<  location->getY() << "," <<  location->getZ() << ")" << std::endl;
00059     }
00060     for (int nCon=0; nCon < modConnectionCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++nCon) {
00061       ModuleConnection* connection = new ModuleConnection( dynamic_cast<lcio::LCGenericObject*>(modConnectionCol->getElementAt(nCon)) );
00062 
00063 
00064       unsigned char type = connection->getModuleType()+4; //types have different numbering scheme in description and location
00065       int index = connection->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell();
00066 
00067       int module = connection->getModuleID();
00068 
00069       delete connection;
00070 
00071       float xLocation = locationMap[index]->getX();
00072       float yLocation = locationMap[index]->getY();
00073       float zLocation = locationMap[index]->getZ();
00074 
00075       for (unsigned int i=0;i<descriptionMap[type]->getNCells();++i) {
00076 
00077         unsigned int cellID = descriptionMap[type]->getGeometricalCellIndex(i);
00078 
00079         if (cellID != 0) {
00080 
00081           int combinedCellID = index + cellID;
00082 
00083 
00084           float xCellInModule=0;
00085           float yCellInModule=0;
00086           float zCellInModule=0;
00087 
00088           xCellInModule = descriptionMap[type]->getCellXPos(i);
00089           yCellInModule = descriptionMap[type]->getCellYPos(i);
00090           if (descriptionMap[type]->hasCellZPos()) zCellInModule = descriptionMap[type]->getCellZPos(i);
00091           else std::cout << " no z position information in CellDescription assuming 0 "<< std::endl;
00092 
00093 
00094           /*
00095            * now rotating cells in the module using rotation matrix:
00096            * @f{eqnarray}{
00097            * cos(\theta) & 0 & sin(\theta) \\
00098            * 0 & 1 & 0 \\
00099            * -sin(\theta) & 0 & cos(\theta)
00100            * @f}
00101            */
00102           float xCellInModuleRotated =      xCellInModule * cos(angle/180.*pi) +             0 + zCellInModule * sin(angle/180.*pi);
00103           float yCellInModuleRotated =                                      0  + yCellInModule + 0;
00104           float zCellInModuleRotated = -1 * xCellInModule * sin(angle/180.*pi) +             0 + zCellInModule * cos(angle/180.*pi);
00105 
00106 
00107           /*
00108            * the rotation also changes the coordinates of the locations
00109            * the z-position is shifted to larger values
00110            */
00111           float xLocationStretched = xLocation;
00112           float yLocationStretched = yLocation;
00113           float zLocationStretched = zLocation/cos(angle/180.*pi);
00114 
00115           /*
00116            * the local position is the rotated module at its location
00117            */
00118           float xLocal = xLocationStretched + xCellInModuleRotated;
00119           float yLocal = yLocationStretched + yCellInModuleRotated;
00120           float zLocal = zLocationStretched + zCellInModuleRotated; // rotation also shiftes the detector slot z position
00121 
00122           /*
00123            * Currently there is no definition of the displacement of the module in the layer.
00124            * It is assumed that the displacement is measured in the detector coordinate system and
00125            * includes alredy an eventual rotation of the module.
00126            * If the displacement should be measured in reference to the module coordinate system,
00127            * and additional rotation would be necessary here:
00128            */
00129           float x = xLocal + xDetector;
00130           float y = yLocal + yDetector;
00131           float z = zLocal + zDetector;
00132 
00133           float sizeX = 0;
00134           float sizeY = 0;
00135 
00136           if ( descriptionMap[type]->hasCellDimensionsPerCell() ) {
00137             sizeX = descriptionMap[type]->getIndividualCellWidth(i);
00138             sizeY = descriptionMap[type]->getIndividualCellHeight(i);
00139           }
00140           else {
00141             sizeX = descriptionMap[type]->getWidth();
00142             sizeY = descriptionMap[type]->getHeight();
00143           }
00144 
00145 
00146           streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "cellID " << std::hex << combinedCellID << std::dec
00147                        << " ( I = " << _mapper->getDecoder()->getIFromCellID(combinedCellID) << " , J = " << _mapper->getDecoder()->getJFromCellID(combinedCellID) << " , K = " << _mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(combinedCellID) << " )"
00148                        << " in module " << module << std::endl
00149                        << " position (x,y,z) : (" << x << "," << y << "," << z <<")" << std::endl
00150                        << " rotation angle   : " << angle << std::endl
00151                        << " calculated from: " << std::endl
00152                        << "  module type                 : " << (int)type << std::endl
00153                        << "   cell index                 : " << std::hex << cellID << std::dec
00154                        << " ( I = " << _mapper->getDecoder()->getIFromCellID(cellID) << " , J = " << _mapper->getDecoder()->getJFromCellID(cellID) << " , K = " << _mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(cellID) << " )" << std::endl
00155                        << "   position in module         : (" << xCellInModule << "," << yCellInModule << "," << zCellInModule <<")" << std::endl
00156                        << "   position in rotated module : (" << xCellInModuleRotated << "," << yCellInModuleRotated << "," << zCellInModuleRotated <<")" << std::endl
00157                        << "  module location : " << std::hex << index << std::dec
00158                        << " ( I = " << _mapper->getDecoder()->getIFromCellID(index) << " , J = " << _mapper->getDecoder()->getJFromCellID(index) << " , K = " << _mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(index) << " )" << std::endl
00159                        << "   position (0deg): (" << xLocation << "," << yLocation << "," << zLocation <<")" << std::endl
00160                        << "   position (now):  (" << xLocationStretched << "," << yLocationStretched << "," << zLocationStretched <<")" << std::endl
00161                        << " detector position: (" << xDetector << "," << yDetector << "," << zDetector <<")" << std::endl << std::endl;
00162 
00163           CellDescription *thisPosition = new CellDescription();
00164           thisPosition->setPosition(x,y,z);
00165           thisPosition->setSize(sizeX,sizeY);
00166           thisPosition->setAngle(angle);
00167           container->fillByCellID(combinedCellID,thisPosition);
00168         }
00169       }
00170 
00171     }
00172 
00173     for (locationMap_t::iterator iter = locationMap.begin(); iter != locationMap.end(); ++iter) delete iter->second;
00174     for (descriptionMap_t::iterator iter = descriptionMap.begin(); iter != descriptionMap.end(); ++iter) delete iter->second;
00175   }
00176 
00177 } //end namespace CALICE
Generated on 1 Dec 2017 for CALICE_USERLIB by  1.6.1
